overview: Walt Sherill is attacked and beat down by a group of juvenile delinquents on his way home from work one night. The boys who attacked him are not previously known by the police and are therefore hard to track down. As Sherill starts getting impatient he begins his own investigation. Meanwhile, Detective Sergeant Koleski does his best to track down the culprits.
tagline: EVIL ENTERS THE HOUSE AT 13 WEST STREET... IT'S SHOCKING AS A SCREAM IN THE NIGHT!!!!
title: 13 West Street
